name: Site Centers Corp.
description: Site Centers Corp. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in shopping centers and retail properties across the United States. Founded in 2015, the company emerged from the spinoff of the retail properties of DDR Corp. Site Centers focuses on the ownership, operation, and redevelopment of open-air shopping centers, primarily anchored by grocery stores and other essential retailers. The company aims to enhance the shopping experience by creating vibrant community spaces that cater to everyday needs, while also prioritizing tenant quality and long-term sustainability. With a diverse portfolio of properties located in key metropolitan areas, Site Centers is committed to maintaining high occupancy rates and delivering value to its shareholders. The company employs strategic capital recycling to optimize its portfolio, investing in both redevelopment opportunities and new acquisitions that align with changing consumer preferences. Site Centers is also focused on enhancing its environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives, reflecting its commitment to responsible property management and community engagement. Through its innovative approach to retail real estate, Site Centers seeks to navigate the evolving retail landscape and capitalize on emerging trends in consumer behavior.

seo.meta_title: Site Centers Corp. | Retail REIT Specializing in Shopping Centers
seo.meta_description: Explore Site Centers Corp., a leading retail REIT focused on shopping center properties. Learn about their innovative approach to retail real estate and community engagement.

faq.question: What type of properties does Site Centers focus on?
faq.answer: Site Centers focuses on open-air shopping centers, primarily grocery-anchored retail properties.

faq.question: Where is Site Centers headquartered?
faq.answer: Site Centers is headquartered in Beachwood, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Site Centers?
faq.answer: David J. Lichtenstein is the CEO of Site Centers Corp.
